name: Monochrome (Mr1upMachine)
description:
Monochome! A twin-stick style wave based shooter with a twist! 

Switch between the three core colors in the visual spectrum, and destroy everything in your path. As you progress, enemies spawn not only on the color you're on, but also on the other two. Only one color is active at a time, but keep an eye on them, as swapping between colors can change your situation drastically!

Controls:
WASD to move, mouse pointer to aim, left click to shoot. Be careful, as you move slower when firing!
